{"step_by_step_thinking": "Managed care is a healthcare delivery system organized to manage cost, utilization, and quality. It provides an organized way of receiving services, so the patient doesn't have to coordinate care with multiple providers. By doing so, it can help to reduce the cost of healthcare, making it more accessible to low-income individuals. Therefore, it can enable more low-income persons to identify a usual source of care.", "answer_choice": "A"}
